text: Lire may refer to: * Lire (magazine), a French literary magazine * Lira (plural lire), a monetary unit in several countries * Liré, a former commune in France * Lire Phiri, Mosotho footballer * Pratica di Mare Air Base, an Italian Air Force base in Rome * The Leaning Tower of Lire, see block-stacking problem. == See also == * Lira (disambiguation) * Lyre (disambiguation)
title: Lire
